Class AbstractDMWithTriggers_mxJPO.Trigger

java.lang.Object

Enclosing class:
AbstractDMWithTriggers_mxJPO
public static class AbstractDMWithTriggers_mxJPO.Trigger
extends Object

Class used to store informations about triggers.

Field Summary
(package private)  String arguments
          Arguments of the called program.
(package private)  String name
          Name of the trigger (like ChangeVaultAction etc...).
private static Pattern PATTERN_EVENTTYPE
          Used to parse the event type of the trigger from the name.
private static Pattern PATTERN_KIND
          Used to parse the event kind ("Action", "Check" or "Override").
(package private)  String program
          Name of the referenced program.

          Appends the MQL statement to remove all triggers.

Used to parse the event type of the trigger from the name.

Method Detail

getEventType

protected String getEventType()
Evaluates from the name the related event type of the trigger.

Returns:
event type of the trigger (always in lower case)
See Also:
name, PATTERN_EVENTTYPE

getKind

protected String getKind()
Evaluates from the name the related king of the trigger.

Returns:
kind of the trigger (always in lower case)
See Also:
name, PATTERN_KIND

write

protected void write(Appendable _out)
              throws IOException
Writes this trigger TCL source code. The trigger event type and kind is parsed by using regular expression PATTERN_EVENTTYPE and PATTERN_KIND to extract the event type and kind.

Parameters:
_out - writer instance
Throws:
IOException - if write failed

appendResetMQLStatement

protected void appendResetMQLStatement(StringBuilder _cmd)
Appends the MQL statement to remove all triggers.

Parameters:
_cmd - string builder with current MQL statement
